name: Larcin Lazer - DELUXE EDITION
description:
THE DELUXE EDITION OF LARCIN LAZER

This is a higher priced version of Larcin Lazer (9.99$ on Steam). Larcin Lazer took me more than a year to make, and I wanted to provide a way to support my work while also giving back with a lot of extras 😊 In this bundle you'll find:

  • A DRM free version of the game, Windows only
  • A Steam key for Windows
  • The full OST of Larcin Lazer (17 musics) + 3 additional tunes
  • The code (Construct 2 & 3) of the game jam version of Larcin Lazer
  • Concepts arts
  • Wallpapers and other visual assets
  • COMING LATER: the mobile version of Larcin Lazer for Android phones (apk)
Avoid deadly lasers, steal from the richest and save your cat 🐱

In this puzzle game combining action and stealth, your memory will be your best tool! Remember the location of the lasers, they disappear as soon as you move. Avoid deadly lasers with style, steal from the richest and save your cat 🐱 Prepare for a MEMORABLE heist!

What's in it for you?! 🕵️‍♂️💎

Larcin Lazer also comes with:

  • Guards, teleporters, locks, but also ghosts, giant lasers, weird buttons and a whole bunch of obstacles to put your memory to the test!
  • More than 170 screens to explore and solve
  • A story told with cartoony cutscenes (steal from bankers, save your cat!)
  • A hint mode if you want a bit of help
  • 5 worlds with unique visuals and sounds
  • Super hard bonus levels, for players with the best memory
  • Jazzy music to delight your ears
